Uses of Class
gui.controller.GameController

Packages that use GameController
Package Description
gui.controller
This package contains the controller classes like SceneController and MovingObjectController.
gui.view
This package contains the classes that implement the stage and the different scenes and panes.
simulator
This package contains the classes to start and store the main information of the game.

  • Uses of GameController in gui.controller

    Fields in gui.controller declared as GameController
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private GameController MovingObjectController.GAME_CONTROLLER
    the actual GameController object that has been created in the method createNewGame() or reloadGame() in the class Game
    Constructors in gui.controller with parameters of type GameController
    Constructor Description
    MovingObjectController​(GameScene gameScene, MovingObject movingObject, GameController gameController, GameValue gameValue, Farmer farmer, Tractor tractor, Harvester harvester, Cultivator cultivator, DumpTruck dumpTruck, SeedDrill seedDrill, FieldTile fieldTile, Silo silo, CourtTrade courtTrade)
    Constructor of the class MovingObjectController that initializes some objects and by calling the method initializeFunctionaliy() an object of the class MovingObjectFunctionalityController to make some actions possible.

  • Uses of GameController in gui.view

    Fields in gui.view declared as GameController
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) GameController SideControlPane.gameController
    object of the class GameController to set the booleans for moving around pressed and released
    Methods in gui.view with parameters of type GameController
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void GameScene.initializeGameScene​(boolean farmer, boolean tractor, boolean harvester, boolean cultivator, boolean dumpTruck, boolean seedDrill, int stageOfGrowthField1, int stageOfGrowthField2, int stageOfGrowthField3, int selectedObject, int column, int row, GameController gameController)
    This method implements all the Nodes for the game scene with the help of the other classes InformationBox, Matchfield and SideControlPane.
    private void GameScene.initializeSideControlPane​(boolean farmer, boolean tractor, boolean harvester, boolean cultivator, boolean dumpTruck, boolean seedDrill, GameController gameController)
    This method gets the sideControlPane from the class SideControlPane that implements a Pane with all the buttons to move around the matchfield and to choose the machine / farmer and adds it to the gamePane.
